title: Starts of the Week + Boom Boom Conclusion, The Oppersnap - Fantasy Football Podcast for 1/6
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 18 matchup previews and Starts of the Week! Plus, injury updates, a new edition of “Never Not Working,” and the Boom Boom Kicker story conclusion! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for January 6th, 2022.
  
 (4:50) - Never Not Working
 (12:50) - NFL News
 (23:15) - Week 18 Matchups
 (23:30) - Chiefs at Broncos
 (27:30) - Cowboys at Eagles
 (30:55) - Bengals at Browns
 (39:50) - Packers at Lions
 (44:45) - Bears at Vikings
 (46:50) - Washington Football Team at Giants
 (50:35) - Colts at Jaguars
 (54:30) - Steelers at Ravens
 (58:40) - Starts of the Week
 (01:03:15) - Boom Boom Kicker of the Week
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube

 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:
